title: How to Make Oat Yogurt (Raw Food)

steps.headline: Pour the ingredients into a food processor or blender.
Mix together until you get a smooth consistency.
Pour the mixture into a glass bowl.
steps.description: Cover the bowl with a lid or upside down plate. Place in a warm spot to ferment for 10 hours. During this time, the mixture will gain in acidity.

steps.headline: Remove from the warm spot and store in the refrigerator to stop it from fermenting any further.
Eat as with yogurt, either by itself or on foods such as fruit.
